QuestData.Title: Precious Goods
QuestData.Description: The gates further down the canyon are shut. Our scouting revealed a stone that they carried in chests in their caravans that they used to open the gates.$B$BGet down there and look for a chest key on the bodies of the guards. When you find it, use it on one of those chests on the caravan wagons and bring the gatestone back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve a Twilight Caravan Gatestone. The Spearwardens should carry keys that can get you into the gatestone chests.
QuestData.CompletionText: They've grown overconfident. More and more, that seems the downfall of the most powerful armies.
QuestData.RewardText: Good going.$B$BDoesn't look like much, does it?
